locks.name: Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Bottom Left Gray Lock (to West Supers)
Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Middle Right Gray Lock (to Sponge Bath)

obstacles.name: Right Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks that separate the bottom right door from the main shaft

obstacles.name: Shot Blocks
obstacles.note: The shot blocks that separate the bottom door from the main shaft

obstacles.name: Left Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks that separate the main shaft from the item on the left

enemies.groupName: Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Trapped Atomics
Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Top Atomics
Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Bottom Atomics

strats.name: Covern or Atomic Ice Clip Door Lock Skip
note: Freeze an Atomic at a precise distance below the door in order to crouch-jump up and clip through the door shell.
The pixel window is larger and higher with Morph and an X-Ray stand-up, in which case a standing jump is used.
If Phantoon is not defeated, stand on the stairs so that Samus is just a few pixels lower, then freeze the Covern low in its cycle.
Alternatively, freeze it high then perform a tight down grab to get onto it for a pixel perfect clip.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Frozen Atomic
note: Bring two atomics to the top of the room.
Stand on one frozen Atomic to bring a second Atomic to the correct height to use as a crouch platform.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Atomic
strats.note: Position and freeze an Atomic to extend the runway. Maintain a half-tile gap between the runway to extend it as far as possible.
strats.devNote: It could be possible to freeze a Covern in its place, but it seems very difficult to position.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Covern or Atomic
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
G-mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: G-mode Overload PLMs
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Cancel g-mode, morph and move back towards the bomb blocks in order to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph to Missiles While Blind
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Exit g-mode and travel to the item and back while off screen.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
strats.devNote: FIXME: It may be possible to extend this runway with a frozen Atomic or Covern.

strats.name: Leave with Runway, Broken Blocks
strats.devNote: It is technically possible to reset at 7 and keep the top layer of obstacle B intact by clipping through the blocks

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Covern or Atomic
Temporary Blue Bounce
strats.devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce (In-Room)
strats.devNote: There is 0.5 unusable tiles in this runway.

strats.name: G-mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: From this direction, the shot blocks are fully breakable with Power Beam

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Moonfall twice, on the right or left side of the shot blocks.
This will put Samus inside of shotblocks, which can be cleared by shooting.
If on the left side, perform two more moonfalls.
The camera will be misaligned after the door transition.

strats.name: Atomic Ice Moonfall Door Lock Skip
note: Lure two Atomics down to the bottom of the room, and freeze them to be able to moonfall between them and aim down.
After gaining enough speed, press forward to fall down and clip past the door shell below.
Falling with too much speed can cause Samus to go out of bounds.

strats.name: Power Bombs
note: It is possible to use a single Power Bomb to break the bomb blocks going left to the item, right to the door, and shot blocks going down.
Place the power bomb against the right wall at the top of the stairs between the three obstacles.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (In-Room)
note: Shinecharging up the stairs gives a longer effective runway than shinecharging down them.
A frozen Atomic (or Covern) can be used for more runway.
strats.devNote: There is 1/2 a unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: G-mode Overload PLMs
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Cancel g-mode, morph and move back towards the bomb blocks in order to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph to Item While Blind
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Exit g-mode and travel to the item and back while off screen.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Full Runway)
Come in Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Short Runway)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Leave With Runway - Frozen Atomic or Covern
note: Lure an Atomic or get a Covern to spawn to slightly extend the runway.
Positioning a Covern is a bit tricky. Consecutive wall jump or Space Jump in place above the gap but not quite at the ceiling,
or perform full height jumps to sometimes get the Covern to spawn in position. A crouch shot may help freeze the Coven when it is in position.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Covern or Atomic
G-mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: G-mode Overload PLMs
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Cancel g-mode, morph and move back towards the bomb blocks in order to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph to Item While Blind
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Exit g-mode and travel to the item and back while off screen.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark
Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.
If Phantoon is not defeated then you have to move quickly to prevent the Coverns from hitting you.

strats.name: Leave With Runway - Frozen Atomic or Covern
note: Lure an Atomic or get a Covern to spawn to extend the runway.
Position the enemy horizontally centered in the hole to extend the runway all the way to the wall.
Positioning a Covern is tricky. One way to set this up is with Space Jump.
Align Samus left against the tile in the ceiling to align the Covern horizontally, then perform short Space Jumps half way between
the desired Covern position and the ceiling until the Covern spawns in the correct position.
strats.devNote: FIXME: There may be other ways to set up the Covern positioning without Space Jump.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Covern or Atomic
G-mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Temporary Blue
strats.devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Chain (In-Room)
note: Shinecharging up the stairs gives a longer effective runway than shinecharging down them.
Bounce down the stairs to make movement simpler.
A frozen Atomic (or Covern) can be used for more runway.
strats.devNote: There is 1/2 a unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: G-mode Overload PLMs
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Cancel g-mode, morph and move back towards the bomb blocks in order to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph to Item While Blind
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Exit g-mode and travel to the item and back while off screen.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce (Come In Shinecharging)
strats.devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce (Come In With Temporary Blue)
strats.devNote: A comeInWithBlueSpringBallBounce strat would also be possible, but there's so little space available that we would need to more carefully define the matching requirements.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Covern or Atomic
Blocks Already Broken
note: If Spring Ball is unavailable, then either crouch jump and morph from the stairs, or run and jump into morph from the right of the stairs.
If you have HiJump, it must be disabled.

strats.name: Shoot the Blocks
note: If Spring Ball is unavailable, then either crouch jump and morph from the stairs, or run and jump into morph from the right of the stairs.
If you have HiJump, it must be disabled.

strats.name: Power Bomb
note: Use a Power Bomb to bounce into the morph tunnel.
This will break the shot blocks and the Bomb Blocks going to the door to the right.

strats.name: Partial Covern Ice Clip
note: Use the Covern to partial ceiling clip so your beam can reach the shot block of the ceiling at the end of the Morph tunnel to the left.
It is possible to mid-air morph to get into the morph tunnel with nothing, from the Covern, the ground, or the stairs below.

strats.name: R-Mode Standup to Shoot the Shot Blocks
note: In R-Mode, kill the Coverns until there is Energy in Samus's Reserves. Get into the Morph tunnel and go to the far left.
Wait for Coverns to damage Samus down until Reserves trigger, forcing a stand up and enabling her to shoot the shot blocks and escape.

strats.name: Coverns and Atomics Farm (Power Off)
note: To shoot the Atomics with Ice or Plasma, crouch near the edge of the glass and shoot forward;
angled shots downwards also work but from a tile further back.
devNote: Killing the Coverns with any of these options can be done on a single cycle.
Screw Attack can kill the Coverns quickly, but can't kill the Atomics. Bombs can kill the Atimics easily, but not the Coverns.
FIXME: Should this require another tech? canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess is a pretty high-level requirement.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: Enter on the left side of the doorway to reduce the amount of energy used.
strats.devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.

strats.name: Shinespark (through Toilet)
strats.devNote: This strat is not useful in-room, but can satisfy a strat in the room before with an exit shinespark.

strats.name: G-Mode Regain Mobility
note: Line up with the far right or left side of doorframe in the room below, to be able to not fall back through after entry, as the door remains open.
Be careful not to fall into the door while being hit by the Covern.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce (Phantoon Dead)
note: Run towards the conveyor to more easily build the ShineCharge, and for an easier bounce into the morph tunnel.
Neutral bounce into the Morph tunnel, and SpringBall bounce to continue all the way through.

strats.name: Chain Temporary Blue Bounce (Phantoon Alive)
strats.note: Neutral bounce into the Morph tunnel, and SpringBall bounce to continue all the way through.
strats.devNote: Defeating Phantoon makes this strat easier.

notables.name: Partial Covern Ice Clip
note: Use the Covern to partial ceiling clip so your beam can reach the shot block of the ceiling at the end of the Morph tunnel to the left.
It is possible to mid-air morph to get into the morph tunnel with nothing, from the Covern, the ground, or the stairs below.
